instructions: From the main Home screen, tap Email . Tap Write . At the 'To' field, enter the recipient's email address. To select from a saved contact, tap the Contacts icon. If necessary, tap the Subject field and enter the desired text. Tap Attach . Select the type of file you want to attach. Navigate to and select the desired file. Tap OK . If necessary, tap the message field and enter the desired text. When finished, tap Send .
From the main Home screen, tap Email . Navigate to and open the email you want to delete. Tap the Trash can icon.
